exclusion: Continuously switch on and switch off the external switch 3 times quickly to start the inclusion or exclusion process
inclusion: Continuously switch on and switch off the external switch 3 times quickly to start the inclusion or exclusion process
label: iShutter

parameters.label: Buttons Mode
parameters.overview:
0 -> One push button

1 -> Two paddles with Power and Direction

2 -> Two toggle switch

3 -> Two buttons with neutral position 

One push button: One button is used (chose any), press while moving up and down, stops, while stopped moves to opposite direction to previous. Two buttons with neutral position: Up click moves up if stopped and stops if moving down, Down click moves down

options.label: Two paddles with Power and Direction

parameters.label: Automatically close after
parameters.description: If not zero, automatically close blind after a user defined time

parameters.label: What to do on RF close command
parameters.description: Defines how to interpret RF Off command.
parameters.overview:
0 -> Close

1 -> Ignore

2 -> Open

3 -> Open if closed, otherwise Close

Can be used in conjunction with Auto Close function: Ignore - to open the door by motion detectors and close it back after some amount of time: in case of multiple motion detectors each would try to open that would that would break logics; Open - to open on both On and Off paddle press on the remote and close after some amount of time. Button close click will still work (if button operations are not disabled). Note that Dim Down command will still begin close motion.

parameters.label: Typical click timeout
parameters.description: time used to differentiate click, hold, double and triple clicks

parameters.label: Action on button press or hold
parameters.description: Defines which command should be sent to Association group
parameters.overview:
Defines which command should be sent to Association group on button press or hold. Scene mode will send 1 for Up event, 2 for Stop, 3 for Down.

1 -> Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set and MultiLevel Start/Stop Changing

2 -> Send Scene

options.label: Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set

parameters.label: LED mode
parameters.overview:
0 -> Disabled

1 -> Show working state

2 -> Always on

3 -> Show opened state

4 -> Indicator Command Class

parameters.label: Full close time
parameters.description: Time to go from opened to closed state.
parameters.overview: Used to estimate the current level. Note that in Permanent motion mode the reported value would a be Closed or Opened, while all Basic and  multilevel Set values (1-99, 255) would Open except 0 value that would Close.

parameters.label: Full open time
parameters.description: Time to go from closed to open state
parameters.overview: Time to go from closed to open state. This value may differ from Full close time for some blinds due to gravity. Used to estimate the current level. Note that in Permanent motion mode the reported value would a be Closed or Opened, while all Basic and Multilevel Set values (1-99, 255) would Open except 0 value that would Close

parameters.label: Node Id of the blocking device
parameters.description: Id of the device which commands would not be Open/Close, but as block/unblock.
parameters.overview: Id of the device which commands would be interpreted not as Open/Close, but as block/unblock. Usefull with door opening detector: if the door is open, block the blind not to break shades while they move.

parameters.label: Protected command
parameters.overview:
Which command from blocking device is closed door and hence, unprotected.

0 -> on On

1 -> on Off

parameters.label: Invert open and close relays
parameters.description: Allow exchanging open and close relays
parameters.overview:
Allow exchanging open and close relays if blind control is wired to the motor incorrectly 

0 -> No

1 -> Yes

associations.label: Click, press and hold of up/down buttons
associations.description: Click, press and hold of up/down buttons

associations.label: Send Reports on blind state change
associations.description: Send Reports on blind state change
